parts.text: You are an educational chatbot designed to answer questions and inquiries from students about the Lebanese International University (LIU).
What is the Freshman Program?
The Freshman Program provides foundational courses for students before they declare majors in LIU's five schools.
You are an educational chatbot designed to answer questions and inquiries from students about the Lebanese International University (LIU).
How can I verify a degree from LIU?
Degree verification requests should be submitted to the Registrar's Office with the graduate's written permission.
You are an educational chatbot designed to answer questions and inquiries from students about the Lebanese International University (LIU).
Does LIU offer Arabic language courses?
Yes, Arabic language courses are available through the School of Arts & Sciences.
You are an educational chatbot designed to answer questions and inquiries from students about the Lebanese International University (LIU).
What student discounts are available?
LIU students receive discounts on software, transportation, and local businesses with valid student ID.
You are an educational chatbot designed to answer questions and inquiries from students about the Lebanese International University (LIU).
How do I access my student email?
Student email accounts are created at enrollment; access through LIU's webmail portal with your credentials.

Are there journalism programs at LIU?
Yes, alumni like Lotus Massoud studied Radio/TV in programs offered through the School of Arts & Sciences.
You are an educational chatbot designed to answer questions and inquiries from students about the Lebanese International University (LIU).
What's the policy on class attendance?
Attendance requirements vary by program, with clinical and lab courses typically having strict policies.
You are an educational chatbot designed to answer questions and inquiries from students about the Lebanese International University (LIU).
How can I get a enrollment certificate?
Request official enrollment certificates from the Registrar's Office, typically processed within 3-5 business days.

Are there psychology programs at LIU?
Psychology programs are offered through the School of Arts & Sciences at undergraduate and graduate levels.

What's the policy on late registration?
Late registration may be permitted during the add/drop period with payment of a late fee.

How can I access course syllabi?
Syllabi are typically distributed in the first class meeting or available through the university's learning management system.

Are there music programs at LIU?
Music and performing arts programs are available through the School of Arts & Sciences.

What's the policy on incomplete grades?
Incompletes may be granted for exceptional circumstances with instructor approval, requiring completion within set timelines.

How can I get involved in research?
Approach faculty in your department about research opportunities or check notices for undergraduate research programs.

Are there architecture programs at LIU?
Architecture programs are offered through the School of Engineering.

What's the policy on course audits?
Course auditing is permitted with instructor approval, though no credit is awarded for audited courses.

How can I access career counseling?
Career counseling is available through the Career Services unit in the Public Affairs office.

Are there culinary arts programs at LIU?
While LIU doesn't offer culinary arts, related nutrition and food science programs are available.

What's the policy on grade appeals?
Grade appeals must follow formal procedures beginning with the course instructor, then department chair if unresolved.

How can I access mental health services?
Counseling services are available through Student Affairs; inquire at your campus office for resources.

Are there fashion design programs at LIU?
Fashion design programs are not currently offered, but related business and marketing programs are available.

What's the policy on academic probation?
Students falling below minimum GPA requirements are placed on probation with specific conditions for continuation.

How can I access disability accommodations?
Register with Student Affairs and provide documentation to receive appropriate academic accommodations.

Yes, environmental science programs are offered through the School of Arts & Sciences.

LIU accommodates religious observances with prior notification to instructors for scheduling conflicts.

Writing assistance is available through academic support services; inquire at your campus library or Student Affairs.

Are there film production programs at LIU?
Yes, film and media production programs are offered through the School of Arts & Sciences.

Students called to active military service receive special accommodations with proper documentation.

What is the size of the Bekaa Campus?

Does the Bekaa Campus have dormitories?
Yes, the Bekaa Campus has separate dormitories for both female and male students among its facilities.

What sports facilities are available at Bekaa Campus?
The Bekaa Campus features an Olympic-size swimming pool, a football stadium, and several green fields for recreational activities.

When was the Beirut Campus established?
The Beirut Campus was founded in 2002 and is located near the Beirut Central District.

What special labs does Beirut Campus have?
Beirut Campus has Pharmacy Dispensing and Compounding labs, a research laboratory with HPLC and GC capabilities, and several well-equipped teaching laboratories.

Where is Saida Campus located?
Saida Campus is situated near the Mediterranean coast, about 40 km south of Beirut and 40 km north of Tyre.

What is unique about Tripoli Campus?
Tripoli Campus is known for its 'Communiversity' concept, creating strong partnerships with the local community and emphasizing diversity among students and instructors.

When was Nabatieh Campus established?
Nabatieh Campus was launched in fall 2006 with about eighty students initially enrolled.

What recreational facilities does Mount Lebanon Campus have?
Mount Lebanon Campus has a basketball court, volleyball court, and community sports facilities among its recreational offerings.

What historical significance does Tyre have?
Tyre (Sour) was founded around 2750 BC and is where the alphabet was introduced to Greece by Cadmus of Sour. Its Roman Hippodrome is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
You are an educational chatbot designed to answer questions and inquiries from students about the Lebanese International University (LIU).
When was Rayak Campus established?
Rayak Campus welcomed its first students in the 2011-12 academic year, serving the Bekaa region from Zahle to Baalbek.
You are an educational chatbot designed to answer questions and inquiries from students about the Lebanese International University (LIU).
What mountain views does Rayak Campus have?
Rayak Campus offers views of Sannin Mountain to the west and the eastern mountain chain to the east.

When was Halba Campus inaugurated?
Halba Campus was inaugurated in October 2013 in northern Lebanon.

How many students were at Halba Campus in its first year?
In its first year, Halba Campus had 171 students enrolled across various degree programs.

What new majors were introduced at Halba Campus?
Halba Campus introduced new majors in Math, Electrical Engineering, Hospitality, and a Radio & TV department with specialized labs.

What is the capacity of Halba Campus's theater?
The theater at Halba Campus can accommodate up to 500 visitors and features backstage rooms.

How many computer labs does Halba Campus have?
Halba Campus has 4 computer labs for all majors plus one specialized MAC lab for interior and graphic design students.
You are an educational chatbot designed to answer questions and inquiries from students about the Lebanese International University (LIU).
What was LIU originally called?
LIU was originally founded as Bekaa University in April 2001 under Presidential Decree No. 5294 before changing to its current name.
